website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those looking for portability at a decent price.
pros: Silver underlining helps to keep the heat down
cons: It's recommended that you purchase weights to keep this tent stable in wind
Some customers point to quality issues with the thin fabric and lightweight frame, as well as the flimsy storage bag

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Money's worth!!! Shipping was extremely fast! I ordered on Wednesday afternoon and received it on Friday. The quality is excellent and it's very easy to assemble! I'm 5'2 and my best friend is 5'5 , it took us less than 10 minutes to fully open the tent. We did not use the instructions to assemble this tent either. Buyers don't hesitate to purchase this item. I will also include a picture for you. Enjoy! :)
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our yard because we have zero shade. Planned to use it for birthday parties or just in the yard on a sunny day as well as camping trips. It comes in a nice case with handles and I set it up by myself and took it down by myself in under 5 minutes. I'm a 5'5" 135lbs female. I am so happy with this purchase. We got the navy blue and the color is awesome
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy. Very easy set up. Works great for my artshows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty pop up canopy and incredibly easy to set up! It took my husband and I about 5 minutes to set up the first time and only a few minutes to take down. While it can probably be done on your own, it's best to have two people just to make it easier, especially when pulling it apart from its fully closed position.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R. Loanzon

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time on our camping trip. It does take about two people to set it up and stretch it out since it's like an accordion. Fabric seemed very durable and the side leg straps were a nice addition to make it look really appealing. The canopy was velcro to the metal which became quite handy when wanting to string lights underneath it. Breaking it down for put away was extremely easy. Wasn't too heavy for me to pick up and store away in its carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: We really like this EZ Up when it came
customer_reviews.text: We really like this EZ Up when it came, especially with the pieces that go down the leg. It looks great. We use ours on our deck all summer long and have had to replace it about every 2 years because of that fact. This one didn't even last all summer before it started filling up with water when it rains and has actually bent the frame. I think these would last a lot longer if the put a couple of drain holes so that heavy rain doesn't destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: MWR2SBR

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Got this Feb 5 set it up Feb 27. That night we got a light rain with slight winds. It buckled and the side cross bars broke in two places. This is a huge waste of money. The entire frame is flimsy and is now in the trash pick up today. Could only salvage is the cover. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle L Kunkelmann

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they don't perform as the ad says. It's not even water resistant. Under medium to heavy rain the water the fabric material to get soaked. When you touch the inside it's all water and the water comes right through the seams, all seams! Me and all my stuff got wet. The metal joints and beans are weak, not sturdy at all. These canopies are not made for outdoor it's made for indoor like the convention center. I wasted $100 (2 x $50) for this.
customer_reviews.author: cheez

customer_reviews.title: “TERRIBLE PRODUCT DO NOT BUY IT”
customer_reviews.text: Product is very poor quality broke the first time I used it i was excited to used it at the beach literally ruin my whole day i have to spend extra money and buy a regular umbrella .First is very difficult to put it together some pieces were missing . I asked for my refund the company wants me to send the product im not going to spend money on sending a broken product this is a regular size item they should straight send me a new product or refund it .I will never buy it from this company again .”TERRIBLE PRODUCT”DO NOT BUY from this company .Terrible quality hard to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Licett Soares

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as promised
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS IF YOU INTEND TO USE IT OUTDOORS! While the online description is clearly for an outdoor product, the packaging advised not to use in a breeze and not to allow it to get wet. WHAT?!?!?!? First light breeze the flimsy side braces folded in and almost broke. Cheap junk! Go to Academy Sports and buy theirs for $20 less – it's sturdy and stood up to days of breezy beach use and still is like new!
customer_reviews.author: ...cusslerfan

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to Get a Sunburn, Even Under The Canopy
customer_reviews.text: This tent seems to be well-made. I have used it for three different afternoon events now and it's holding up just fine, even under some wind gusts. What I DO NOT LIKE is that there is no SPF protection from the sun. My family sat under this canopy for three little league baseball games and got sunburns ALL THREE TIMES. Sure, the canopy provides shade, but unless you wear sunscreen too, you're going to get burned. I know it sounds odd since you're sitting in shade, but the sun's rays come right on through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: ZacAttack

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Mine lasted 2 days of use before it was thrown in the trash. Frame bent from 8 mph winds, cheap plastic broke on bottom of legs once they were nailed down. Should have bought the Ozark Trail brand at WalMart for $71 instead, it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST CANOPY EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile back to replace my old canopy that ripped after years of use. It sat in my garage for awhile unopened. Finally, camping came around and I set it up. 20 minutes later, the water started pooling in the canvas. Myself and three other people kept pushing the water out. Finally, after another 20 minutes, it collapsed. The pictures attached were 30 seconds apart. Very weak construction. If you intend to use this canopy to stay out of the rain, you're going to have a bad time. A canopy should last longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: nick horner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fragile. Seemed fine at first. After about seven deployments I noticed that the fabric on the roofing was tearing. After seven to eight deployments some of the aluminum struts in the roof broke clean off. Rendering the whole thing useless and unable to close properly. I had to break more struts in order to get the whole thing down to size. I took good care of the tent and was careful during transport, deployment, and breaking it down. Not worth the price. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy easy! Took to beach. Another couple had a different, larger canopy and putting theirs up was a pain. Theirs took 4 people and took 15 minutes at least. Putting up this one was a piece of cake. With 2 people was up in under 5 minutes. It was awesome! Get the sand bags if using at the beach it really worked well. Easy take down too!
customer_reviews.author: vanbsu1

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent and the price was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent and the price was perfect....I use it for my disabilities fairs several times a year. It is very easy to open with help of one person but you can use all four and up and down in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Although I did need another person to help me set it up. It was fairly easy. Only issue I had was the snaps on the legs they're hard to push in to take it back down when it's time to go home
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought for feast of tabernacles, upon setting it up, we found that 3 out of 4 of the buttons to raise it up were broken. Luckily, we had duct tape to secure the legs. We were already at the camp site, so it was too late to go get another canopy.
customer_reviews.author: sarah swenson

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tent to use on the beach in sunny LA weather, but the wind knocked it over. Had so much trouble setting up and keeping it in place, parts were missing, the frame bowed out, the fabric wouldn't stay on, and overall regret purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good canopy, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good canopy, it provides shade and seems to block uv rays. The first one I got broke as I was taking it out of the package. Customer service was great! They got a replacement out and within a week the new one arrived. I’m giving 4 stars because the color has faded after a week in the sun. It went from a neutral brown (i ordered “caffee”) to a weird purple. Otherwise it’s worth what you’re spending.
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been great, but it broke on first use. Not sturdy at all. Regret going cheap and wish I’d bought a quality pop up canopy instead.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Read directions
customer_reviews.text: I left the canopy up over night and it rained. When I got up it was down and bent beyond repair. I didn’t read the directions very good and it said for shade only. Not made to stand up against rain and wind. I did not ask for a refund because of my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Quality assurance
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this canopy until i got it set up. It was easy to set up but once it was I realized the frames was bent in 2 places and there is a small whole on the actual canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great for short term use
customer_reviews.text: Used this canopy as shade over the picnic table while camping - it was a life saver. However, it didn't make the return trip home, because the supports bent. One night had strong winds (10+ MPH), which bent the upper supports, and wasn't discovered until time to pack everything up. Needless to say, didn't get it back to it's original shape. Great for short term (be aware of the weather), but it's fortitude is in question for extended adventures.
customer_reviews.author: John Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for a refund. Did not set up properly. Collapsed and unable to reclose. DO NOT BUY! Trusted a review showing 3 different tents. I can’t imagine a worse tent. Will let you know if they honor return and change review.
customer_reviews.author: BenandRose

customer_reviews.title: Short and breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one day. Very flimsy. A breeze came and knocked it over and broke the metal holding it. And we even staked it. What a waste. I'd give this zero stars if I could. Also when assembled is very short, even when set to the highest setting for hight. And I'm 5ft 5in. And I had to duck to get under.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong, doesn't handle windy beach weather.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to believe all the reviews that said how good it was. It's not bad, but on a windy day one of the top arm broke. When comparing our tent to others at the beach it was noticeably cheaper and smaller. If you are going to be somewhere windy you should probably pick another tent.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was awesome
customer_reviews.text: The first canopy that got here must have been defective first rain ee had crumbled the whole thing. I sent one e mail requesting a resolve and the only request they had was a couple photos. The new one was her in about 7 days. They were professional very nice and very quick to make it rite. The second one has survived hard winds and light rain with no issues. I would highly recommend this simply due to the outstanding customer service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Just received product on Monday, assembled on Tuesday and notice along the seams the threading sucks! Had rain on Wednesday leaked right through the seams! Not worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy ~
customer_reviews.text: This shelter would hold water if it rains, which would probably collapse it. Not very sturdy or strong. Easily set up for shade, but you can't leave it if it is going to be windy or rainy. Suggest you shop around ~
customer_reviews.author: Grover Ligon

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to cover a 10ft. circular above ground pool to protect the little ones from the the sun. Easily set up and easily removed. Withstood a fair amount of wind with the use of canopy leg weights. This will last the season, maybe 2 seasons, which makes it worth the price. Sets up in less than 10 minutes but 2 people setting up is optimal.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of junk. First and only time I used it it was missing two buttons on the corner supports, two of the corner fabric extensions were missing loops to secure them, when the unit was up you could see the sky through most of the seams which later leaked and when a shower came the fabric sagged and large pools of water were present and had to be worked of to prevent it from collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Swimming canopy
customer_reviews.text: My son and family love this canopy for size and ease of assembly. I am told this takes 5 minutes! Use for swim meets. Will provide camping and back yard uses as well. The darker blue COLOR also provides for better Sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and looks so much nicer than those ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days as another reviewer had mentioned. So easy to use and looks so much nicer than those blue or green tarp-y looking ones you can buy in stores. Comes with metal stakes that hold it in the ground and held up very nicely on a windy day. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in the AM in the backyard on the patio next to the house. There was no wind and it was down and broken the next day. Not worth the money, don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: litlkay

customer_reviews.title: easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Fairly light given its size, medium duty construction quality - I don't think it would handle very much wind, easy to put up and take down. Be careful when pushing the tab lock buttons, my daughter managed to push it all the way inside the frame and it got stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. So easy to put up, so easy to put down no fits in the bag every time. I will be buying more. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: S. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: After reading a review on a much pricier canopy, settled on this one. After a month’s use and setting up and taking it down daily, it’s held up extremely well. Still looks like new. Used as shade cover for workmen.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Snapped like a piece of dry spagetti
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing beach volleyball and owning tents for 20 years. The aluminum on this tent is not enough for the size of the structure. I was opening it for the first time. The alum poles on the side caught on to the black connector and snapped. The metal is so thin, I didn't even hear it. I cannot imagine having just the tiniest bit of wind torque this thing and it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Defective ... maybe I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: It came defective. The buttons that keep the tent legs up were missing. I was able to return and receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Completely functionless garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Two legs didn’t have the “spring loaded snap” to keep leg extended, and frame snapped as I was trying to Keep legs extended. Bought well ahead of time, so I am boned.
customer_reviews.author: Imaginary Friend

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for camping, bad idea, first wind gust it blew away even though it was staked down with the paper clip thin stakes provided, and the thin metal accordians broke in two locations.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy33

customer_reviews.title: the tent is easy to set up and is sturdy and performs as ...
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the canopy had a small rip in it upon taking it out of the package which was very disappointing, but the seller was very responsive and dealt with the problem quickly! Otherwise, the tent is easy to set up and is sturdy and performs as expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Davis

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: We got this to protect gym equipment during rain. Well it didn’t work! Caved in right away. Also upon setting up some pieces came broken. Wish I returned it then.
customer_reviews.author: HollyDay

customer_reviews.title: I give it two stars because it looked great and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I give it two stars because it looked great and was easy to set up. As soon as there was a tiny breeze the joints bet in the opposite direction and the tent crumpled down, a few of the plastic connectors snapped and some of the metal poles broke off. We nursed it for 5 days with duct tape and ropes to hold it up while camping and tossed it when we were done.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and well made for the pirce it was and ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont know why I didnt get one two years ago when we moved to our new home. The deck faces the east and gets sun until well past noon. This is sturdy and well made for the pirce it was and I set it up all by myself! Took alittle time to do it, but I did! Is not rain proof, but they tell you in their description, but definitely sun proof!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I don't understand how anybody can write a good review on these. Mine folded in on itsepf with only a minimal gust of wind Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely poor quality. Took on beach vacation and out of the box, two of the feet were broken off. So had to go buy pliers to get the legs to retract. Within 3 hours, the tent had collapsed multiple times due to the poor quality of the frame. Threw in the trash and rented umbrellas! Very disappointed. Do NOT waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nicely

customer_reviews.title: tarp of poor quality and tears at ea corner because you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up, very flimsy, tarp of poor quality and tears at ea corner because you have to stretch it so tight to get it over the last corner that all other corners rip open. I recommend you do not buy this product although it is cheap it is of cheap and very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and received four of these canopies for over and around my 1200 gallon Koi pond. Easy to set up and so far works very nice. I am going to order another one in a few days. We can sit under the canopies and watch the 14 Koi and not be in the 105 degree sun.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, inferior, garbage
customer_reviews.text: The locking bolts were either jammed or missing, all parts associated with this are inferior. Classic "gotcha", ordered last fall to use this summer, putting this together without functioning parts is almost impossible, have decided to drill my own holes and come up with my own locking system. I would never, ever buy another product from Tangkula.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Memmesheimer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Very easy to set up and take down ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Very easy to set up and take down -- with four of us, it literally took two minutes, but is definitely possible for one person to do (and still only takes about five minutes). Looks great and does what we wanted: provides shade!
customer_reviews.author: d.

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy. Easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy. Easy to set-up. I use at festivals and tailgating. Not too big; not too small. One can decorate with lights; game colors, etc. Looks great. Have had many compliments on it. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice color. Doesn't look like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Doesn't look like cheap plastic. It seems sturdy and so far has held up well. It is being held in place using the strings provided. I've tied it up against my fence. I've also used the stakes it came with. So far so good. If it gets too windy then I'll be buying weights. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Huge slit on shade cover. Had to super glue as we needed to use it same day.
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly excellent quality for the price. I shopped around and couldn't beat the price for that size. Seems to be durable too. We'll see how it holds up around drunk people ;) I never write reviews but this thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sean T Haberle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you live in a windy area.
customer_reviews.text: The frame broke during the first use. The wind bent it in half. Not worth the money if you live in any place that has wind gusts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice canopy, if not windy....
customer_reviews.text: The canopy set up nicely at home on our practice run but the wind at the beach was too much for it. We had 10-20 mph winds on first day and it's still standing but the canopy frame is showing some bends. The canopy worked well, but I was probably too optimistic on how much breeze it could handle.
customer_reviews.author: David Ray

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice and wasn't as flimsy/poor quality as some reviewers mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as a cover for musicians at our outdoor wedding ceremony; price was the same as renting. Looked nice and wasn't as flimsy/poor quality as some reviewers mentioned. However, we were careful when putting up and taking down just in case. We've only used twice so cannot comment on the durability; but seems that if you aren't too rough it should hold up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tent but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is made with the thinnest plastic and It broke after one use Edit: I told Tangkula about my experience and they ended up giving me a full refund. I appreciate them having great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Van Deerlin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: careful with the set up, I broke two of the arms. Ya get what you pay for. perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Item broke on first use, mild wind (5 - 10 mph)
customer_reviews.text: Unforunately, this item broke on first use within 15 mins of set up while on the beach with extremely mild wind. Wanted to love the item and prove my wife wrong on the purchase but it ended up in the trash with 4 broken poles a broken spring. Caution in purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: James Carransa

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use
customer_reviews.text: Set up and take down easy but broke after one use. Three hinges broke and one of the tension balls to raise the legs fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Darlena

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup snd nice for full sun
customer_reviews.text: I find this tent easy to put up and take down. Great to block sun on Patio. It is great for light rain but heavy rain will gather on top sides of tent if you don't keep draining it and may stretch the material, but not a problem because if it rains heavy its super easy to take down.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Howe

customer_reviews.title: First windy big day (30mph) that i had to use ...
customer_reviews.text: First windy big day (30mph) that i had to use the canopy, it broke. Has to use duck tape and tent spikes to fix it for the weekend. then had to trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to positive reviews. 3 star at best.
customer_reviews.text: After reading positive reviews I had expected a better product. It is basically what you would expect if you only paid $70 for a canopy. Not as well made as the $100 canopies. Plastic feet on legs vs welded metal. One fell off as Inwas putting it up in the driveway. Hopefully I will get a few trips to the beach out of these. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cclark_va

customer_reviews.title: Leg is bent and broken.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and set up was easy. Used it once at my backyard but one of the legs (lower part) is bent probably due to the high wind we experienced that day and when I tried to make it straight, it got broken! Looking to see if I can just buy the replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Pemba

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's EZ name!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for a family reunion camping trip to use as shade or shelter depending on weather. They went up quickly and easily. Quality is great. I expect to get many years of use out of them. I recommend canopy weights in case of wind.
customer_reviews.author: T Muel

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality. Have only used it once. but was surprised how well made it was for the price..
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Ordering Another
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Loved it (key word...."loved")....until the wind blew it away. I'm ordering another with sandbags to hold it down. Other than that, very easy to setup and breakdown....and blow away, if not held down properly.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. Shipped very quickly. Easy and fast set up and take down. Storage bag is well made. Am looking forward to years of use from this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to set up and transport
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift. They are easy to set up and transport. They are great for portable shade, not so much if it starts to rain.
customer_reviews.author: Elpeneke Salter

customer_reviews.title: I exchanged it for a pop up version that I love. Seller was very helpful with the exchange
customer_reviews.text: Much too difficult to set up. I exchanged it for a pop up version that I love. Seller was very helpful with the exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Britton, LMT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and bowl myself. Used for camping. . Loved it
customer_reviews.author: pinksharilynne

customer_reviews.title: Tent mistake
customer_reviews.text: Nice until the rain and wind blow it down. I will order another but will take it down every night.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. A very nice product for the money. Sets up easily with two people. Spikes provided will not hold canopy in the wind. However, the sand bags for sale are a good idea. Or do as I did & use trash bags/buckets filled with sand to hold down the legs.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Well made, REALLY easy to get up and take down and looks expensive although it was cheaper than most!
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I got coffee color. The brown is very nice. Easy to set up and the quality is great. It arrived 2 days earlier than the estimated day.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what we needed and they do not ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for our campsite. One for the picnic table and one for our golf cart. Perfect size for what we needed and they do not collect rain like some of our others have.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cuddemi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Unhappy LABOR DAY PARTY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely DISSATISFACTION! Put it it put Easy, Then it began to rain 4 hours later and 2 of the legs bent in half. TOTALED the Entire thing!😠
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap. It came with rope that literally just broke if you pulled on it. It blew over today and the rope all snapped. My window for return was up yesterday so that’s nice. Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold up in windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but unless anchored, won’t withstand windy weather
customer_reviews.author: mia mateia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! Crap!  Not good!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy was up one week. We had a thunderstorm and instead of the water running off of the canopy, it fill up like a pool and collapsed within itself. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY TO SET UP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family reunion camping trip to use on camp site with little shade. VERY easy to put up with 2 people!! It's very sturdy and lite. Would definitely recommend this product, Awesome price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Gin G

customer_reviews.title: canapy
customer_reviews.text: the sun shade was easy to construct, the top of the canapy is very weak it should have better reinforcement to prevent the rain from prevent it from collapsing .
customer_reviews.author: james w gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other similar type tents and this is the first one that I have had no issue putting it up myself. High quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: I love my tent!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to vend and it's typically the tallest one compared to others around me making it a lil easier to spot my booth in a crowd.. i love it so much and am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice for a day at the beach
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice for a day at the beach, but you cannot leave it out in a rainy day. The water puddles up on the top and bend the aluminum frame.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Solid gazebo.
customer_reviews.text: Ok construction. Height adjustable. EZ pop up. It can be a single person job. Durability over time is suspect. I would rate the quality low. It measured out to an accurate 10 ft. i included a banana for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Sony Merus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Set up, had a five gallon bucket of water on each corner. Five minutes later the wind folded it in half snapping the metal bracing. 10 minutes after setting it up it was in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Set it up to use at the river, metal part on the poles (three of them!) broke immediately upon use. They did refund the money after several heated emails.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Was as described
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to have had a better way to anchor it to the ground, but it will work for my purposes
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ecker

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I set it up in 15min by myself. Took it down in less time. Going to the beach soon and will see how it does I bought some canopy weight bags to secure this at the beach . It looks good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William B Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good shade.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down with at least 3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent choice for the money. Easy up for sure. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Nakano

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this canopy!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is horrible!! The legs are flimsy and the top isn’t tight so it will collect rain water and collapse under the weight of the water. We used it 4 days camping and rain came through one day and our canopy was destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Good EZ POP UP Canopy tent to set up
customer_reviews.text: Good EZ POP UP Canopy tent to set up, looks attractive. However, needs metal base on all four bottom poles, provided by other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice canopy but faded to a really light green after ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice canopy but faded to a really light green after only 2 months in the sun. Durability seems to be fine though and held up to high winds but had to buy longer stakes to hold it down. 2 of the tie down strings broke as well. Not an overly impressive product
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great as a pop up, not sturdy enough to leave up.
customer_reviews.text: This looked great but was completely demolished after wind and rain. This is to be used for a pop up only. Can not be left out permanently for extra shade.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... was missing a screw in one section but the great customer service helped me get a new one
customer_reviews.text: First order was missing a screw in one section but the great customer service helped me get a new one. Good product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

product_meta.title: Tangkula Outdoor Tent, 10’X10’ EZ Pop Up Portable Lightweight Height Adjustable Study Instant All Weather Resitant Event Party Wedding Park Canopy Gazebo Shelter Tent with Carry Bag
product_meta.description:
Description: 
The 10x10 pop up tent comes with rust-resistant strong steel frame and all weather proof oxford cloth. The tent performs well in outdoor rainy or sunny days. The tent is light and occupy little space when it is folded. You can carry it to anywhere you want. When you and your friends go hiking, picnic or hold a pool party, or you hold a flea market, the tent give you a great help. The tent will serve you long time. Welcome to buy this easy pop up tent. 

Feature: 
Easy pop up tent
Waterproof and UV-resistant 
Equip with silver-coated 210D oxford cloth
Structure strong rust-resistant pole
With carry bag
Height Adjustable
Severs well in garden, poolside, or any other outdoor environment
Silver Coating Cover Blocks Up To 99% Of The Suns UV Rays

Caution:
Please Read The Pop Up Instruction Thoroughly Before Using The Unit. 
Please Retain Instruction For Future Reference.
Please Fold And Fasten The Tent Or Take It Down In Blustery And Thunderstorm Day.
Keep The Tent Away From Fire
feature_bullets: Sturdy Structure: The party tent comes with white powder–coated rust resistant strong steel frame. Size of poles is 20x20x0.6mm. Each tent equipped with 4 wind ropes and 8 diggers.
Waterproof and UV-resistant: The canopy is made of 210D silver-coated oxford cloth, which is water and sunny proof. The shelter provides shade in summer day and protect you against rainy.

Portable and Easy Pop Up: Easy pop up tent comes with carry bag. You can pup up this tent in seconds by yourself or with your friend. You can put the tent in the trunk when you are in picnic, and the storage occupy little space.
Multi-function: The 10x10 pop up tent can be used for wedding, picnic, BBQ by the beach, or pool party. And it performs also well in flea market or fruit market or other outdoor events.
Dimension of Patio Tent: About 10’x 10’ x 8’, height is from floor to top center.
